lib.orianna.api

Class RateLimiter

  • java.lang.Object
    • lib.orianna.api.RateLimiter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    lib.easyjava.net.rest.RateLimiter

    public class RateLimiter
extends java.lang.Object
implements lib.easyjava.net.rest.RateLimiter
    Wrapper for EasyJava's RateLimiter to hide EasyJava from consumers. Used to throttle API requests.
    Author:
    Rob Rua (FatalElement - NA) (robrua@alumni.cmu.edu)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  RateLimiter.RateLimit

      • RateLimiter

        public RateLimiter(int callsPerEpoch,
                   long millisPerEpoch)
        Use this constructor to manage a single limit
        Parameters:
        callsPerEpoch - the number of allowed called
        millisPerEpoch - the window of time they are allowed in
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • defaultDevelopmentRateLimiter

        public static RateLimiter defaultDevelopmentRateLimiter()
        Returns:

      • tenPerTenSeconds

        public static RateLimiter tenPerTenSeconds()
        Returns:
        the default rate limiter for development with the LoL API, but ignoring the 500/10min restriction
